content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

This iconic hotel is the perfect place for a family Easter: culinary delights, a selection of premium wines and sparkling wines, piano music and a children’s Easter egg hunt are just some of the experiences that will surely mark this holiday. Make the most of the spring break and come holiday in Zagreb with your loved ones. Relax in the cheerful ambience of Zinfandel’s restaurant at a delicious feast with various beloved delicacies.

Family Tradition – Easter Lunch at Zinfandel’s

Indulge in signature Easter specialities by famous Executive Chef Ana Grgić Tomić – local ham roasted in crispy bread dough, Esplanade’s signature oven-crisped štrukli, fine creamy spring asparagus soup, shortcrust pastry tarts with prawns, sea bass fillet with creamy Swiss chard, roasted duck in orange and honey marinade, lamb shank with roasted polenta, beef cheeks, traditional steak tartare hand-chopped and prepared by your table, and veal Wellington are just some of the delicious dishes that await you on the Easter menu.

A selection of divine Easter desserts created by the Esplanade’s experienced pâtissiers is a gourmet experience that is not to be missed. Enjoy the irresistible delicacies of the dessert table, including the noteworthy shortcrust pastry cheese tarts with wild berries, delicious cake with almonds, and the fantastic chocolate cake with poppy seeds, while for a true Easter experience, ensure you do not miss the traditional Esplanade pinza with dried fruit and citrus fruits, as well as the shortcrust pastry poppy seed roll and walnut roll, and tempting chocolate eggs.

Indulge in the ambience while your little ones have fun in the cheerful Easter playroom with animators who will prepare numerous games, as well as a creative egg decorating workshop  and the Easter egg hunt.

Easter brunch is served on Easter Sunday, 31 March 2024, from 12:30 to 16:00 at Zinfandel’s restaurant. Number of guests is limited, which is why we recommended booking a table in advance. The price for the Easter lunch with a glass of sparkling wine, entertainment for children, and a piano performance is EUR 145 per person, while the children’s menu is EUR 85 per child.

  • Easter lunch

To make a table reservation at Zinfandel’s restaurant:

+385 (0)1 4566 644

zinfandels@esplanade.hr

 

Published: 4.3.2024.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Easter brunch is served on Easter Sunday, 31 March 2024, from 12:30 to 16:00 at Zinfandel’s restaurant. Number of guests is limited, which is why we recommended booking a table in advance.
